Package cotton.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NetworkHandler
    Implementing this interface enables a class to act as a network handler.
    ServiceChain
    The ServiceChain maintains the chain of services to be executed.
    TransportPacket.OriginOrBuilder  
    TransportPacket.PacketOrBuilder  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultNetworkHandler
    Handles all of the packet buffering and relaying.
    DefaultServiceRequest  
    DestinationMetaData  
    DummyServiceChain
    The DummyServiceChain implements the ServiceChain interface and maintains the chain of services to be executed.
    NetworkPacket
    The NetworkPacket wraps the data together with needed information to direct the packet.
    NetworkPacket.NetworkPacketBuilder
    An NetworkPacket builder to construct a NetworkPacket in separate steps.
    Origin
    Contains connection information about the origin of a service request.
    SocketLatch
    The SocketLatch is designed to block the program until an incoming packet is received or set as failed.
    TransportPacket  
    TransportPacket.Origin
    Protobuf type cotton.network.Origin
    TransportPacket.Origin.Builder
    Protobuf type cotton.network.Origin
    TransportPacket.Packet
    Protobuf type cotton.network.Packet
    TransportPacket.Packet.Builder
    Protobuf type cotton.network.Packet
